title: Too long a delay on obvious exploit hot fixes?
body:
Just my thoughts is that there are some obvious gameplay issues being exploited right now..

Not just Warwicks obviously broken suppression damage but also this Pantheon level 2 Dragon business... It's just mind boggling that such a competitive game is left in such a broken and trollable state for such a long duration.

Imagine you crapped your pants and just didn't change them for a month.

replies.body: How can a Warwick who plays poorly throughout the game gradually farm up after a short duration and ULT Kill pretty much any carry. Ridiculous. A poor score of 3/7 with average farm was 1-2 hitting carries with 2 items.

do you even understand what you are saying? those arent exploits, those are game mechanics workins as intended.
for years on hit WW could do a ton of damage by procing multiple on hit effect with his ult because thats how it worked. 5 auto attacks in 1.8 seconds working with 5 on hit procs.
panth shield working as intended. also.

not to mention its beta.
not to mention the panth dragon thing is easily countered. its just a mechanic/dynamic of the game, if you cant adapt its your issue.
a bigger issue is the boards posting sometimes showing my posts to me as anonymous and missing the first 3 lines i write errytym so i need to rewrite it.....ugh
Neither an an exploit. Pantheon has always been able to snag the dragon early, the risk wasn't worth the reward due to most supports warding it.
